quest.title: The Bloodstone Chalice
quest.objective: fill the Bloodstone Chalice for Harkon
tasks: follow Garan Marethi to the Bloodstone Chalice
fill the Bloodstone Chalice for Harkon
quest.description:
Lord Harkon. Remember your place. Now, he wants the Chalice, then.
You've heard of the Bloodstone Chalice? The Chalice has been in Lord Harkon's possession for quite some time now. It is, when used properly, able to increase the potency of our powers.
Lord Harkon has neglected using the Chalice for ages. If he wants it filled now, then grander things are afoot. This is good.
Follow me. I'll take you to the Bloodstone Chalice.

TESS507: the god of infection and pestilence

plots: Orchendor was sent to gather Afflicted to Bthardamz: Orchendor betrayed Peryite afterwards

quest.title: The Only Cure
quest.objective: kill Orchendor, and return to Peryite
tasks: Go to Bthardamz.
find Orchendor
kill Orchendor, and return to Peryite
quest.description:
I have watched you for some time, you know. The decisions you've made intrigue me, and I wonder if you are the proper agent for a task of mine.
I sent a blessing to the world, a wasting plague that infected a scattering of Breton villages. One of my monks, the elf Orchendor, was sent to gather these Afflicted. He shepherded them into Bthardamz for me, but has since lost his way.
I will not stand for betrayal. I want you to go to Bthardamz and kill Orchendor, in my name. I can grant you a powerful token for this task. An escutcheon of dwarven make, capable of shielding you from both the spell and sword. Return when the elf lies dead and it will be yours.

TESS433: the player's leader in the Stormcloaks
TESS290: the headquarters of the Imperial legion

plots: Ulfric is addressing the player and the player's fellow Stormcloaks: the true sons and daughters of Skyrim
Sovngarde awaits those who die fighting
the gods will look down and see Skyrim as she was meant to be: full of Nords who are mighty, powerful, and free

quest.title: A Crumbling Empire
quest.objective: conquer Solitude, and free Skyrim from the Empire
tasks: fight your way to Castle Dour to cut the head off the Imperial legion itself
conquer Solitude, and free Skyrim from the Empire
quest.description:
This is it men! It's time to make this city ours!
We come to this moment carried by the sacrifices and the courage of our fellows. Those who have fallen. And those still bearing the shields to our right. On this day, our enemy will know the fullness of our determination, the true depth of our anger, and the exalted righteousness of our cause.
The gods are watching. The spirits of our ancestors are stirring. And the men under suns yet to dawn will be transformed by what we do here today. Fear neither pain, nor darkness. For Sovngarde awaits those who die with weapons in their hands, and courage in their hearts.
We now fight our way to Castle Dour to cut the head off the legion itself! And in that moment, the gods will look down and see Skyrim as she was meant to be. Full of Nords who are mighty, powerful, and free!
Ready now! Everyone, with me! For the sons and daughters of Skyrim!

plots: Tim wants knowledge

quest.title: Made of Obsidian
quest.objective: bring some obsidian blocks to Tim
tasks: make water flow on lava to form obsidian
mine out obsidian blocks
bring some obsidian blocks to Tim
quest.description:
I have a task for you, stranger. And I'm willing to give you something precious in return.
There are age-old tales of strong, volcanic glass. This glass is known as obsidian. I'd love to try out my masonry on obsidian!
The tales also say that you can make obsidian by directing water on lava pools. There are many such pools underground in deep caves. I would ask you to mine out some obsidian blocks for me.
I'm not built for adventure myself: carving stones is all I know.

TESS448: a farmer who does not think highly of Leontius
TESS449: and old inn to the south

plots: Rogatus Salvius does no think highly of his son

quest.title: Rogatus's Letter
quest.objective: deliver a letter to Leontius
tasks: Go to Old Hroldan Inn.
find Leontius
deliver a letter to Leontius
quest.description:
My boy Leontius lives in Old Hroldan. Old inn to the south.
Damn drunk. The oaf doesn't even bother to visit these days. What am I supposed to do if the dragons burn down the farm?
You're a traveler, right? I have this letter for him. Let him know how much of a failure he is. You make sure the lug tips you when he gets it.

TESS279: a fellow member of the Thieves Guild, and a Nightingale

plots: the binding terms of the oath with Nocturnal: the player will be required to defend the Twilight Sepulcher and everything within when the need arises, and upon the player's death, the player's spirit will be bound to the Twilight Sepulcher as one of its guardians

quest.title: Trinity Restored
quest.objective: transact the oath with Nocturnal and become one of the Nightingales
tasks: undergo the ceremony to become a Nightingale
transact the oath with Nocturnal and become one of the Nightingales
quest.description:
Are you ready to transact the Oath with Nocturnal?
By transacting the Oath with Nocturnal, you're entering into a business deal. You'll be provided all of the power and knowledge befitting a Nightingale. You're free to use those powers as you see fit to further your own goals or the goals of the Thieves Guild.
In return, you'll be required to defend the Twilight Sepulcher and everything within when the need arises. More importantly, upon your death, your spirit will be bound to the Twilight Sepulcher as one of its guardians.
Once the Oath has been struck, the terms are binding. Knowing this, are you ready to undergo the ceremony?

TESO392: the dangerous ruins of an Ayleid city
TESO393: the third item the player needs for the Mysterium Xarxes ritual, and a rare larger variant of Welkynd Stones valued by mages and occultists

plots: Martin has made some progress in deciphering the Mysterium Xarxes ritual while the player was gone
the player may have seen lesser Welkynd Stones: they are common in Ayleid ruins

quest.title: Miscarcand
quest.objective: recover a Great Welkynd Stone for Martin
tasks: Go to Miscarcand.
find a Great Welkynd Stone
recover a Great Welkynd Stone for Martin
quest.description:
While you were gone, I've made some progress in deciphering the Mysterium Xarxes ritual.
The third item we need is a Great Welkynd Stone. You may have run across lesser Welkynd Stones; they are fairly common in Ayleid ruins. But a Great Welkynd Stone will not be easy to come by. They have been plundered one by one over the years, due to their great value to mages and occultists.
There is only one place that is rumored to still contain one: the ruins of the Ayleid city of Miscarcand. A place where many have perished seeking its Great Welkynd Stone. But nothing else will do, so you must succeed where all others have failed.

BG2159: a knight of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart

plots: the player is a member of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
Sythillisian Empire has invaded Amnian lands

quest.title: Knights Rescue
quest.objective: rescue the knights of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
tasks: Go to Umar Hills.
repel the invasion to the Amnian outpost
rescue the knights of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart
quest.description:
Welcome. I, William Reirrac, have been awaiting you. You should know the particulars of your service here and what being a member of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart really means.
You are aware of the conflict with the Sythillisian Empire? There have been invasions into Amnian lands. We have been monitoring outposts, and all is not well. One outpost reported an imminent attack because an enemy unit needed their supplies. A runner barely made it with the information, and we fear the worst.
You must leave immediately for the furthest lengths of the Umar Hills. You must join the combat and rescue our knights, for they are surely outnumbered.
Go, and rescue whom you can. You have little time.

TESS314: the welcoming headmaster of the Bards College
TESS320: a part of the Poetic Edda, the living history of Skyrim, a poem dealing with King Olaf

plots: Jarl Elisif has forbidden the burning of King Olaf, a festival put on by the Bards College: to convince Jarl Elisif change her mind, Viarmo wants to read King Olaf's Verse

quest.title: Tending the Flames
quest.objective: become a member of the Bards College
tasks: Go to Dead Men's Respite.
retrieve King Olaf's Verse
become a member of the Bards College
quest.description:
Welcome to the Bards College. I am Viarmo, the headmaster here.
Always a pleasure to meet a prospective bard. You should be aware that many apply but we accept very few people. When possible, we ask applicants to perform tasks the college needs completed. In this case, I do have a task befitting an aspiring bard...
Jarl Elisif has forbidden the Burning of King Olaf, a Festival put on by the Bards College. We need to change her mind. To convince her I want to read King Olaf's Verse. A part of the Poetic Edda, the living history of Skyrim. Unfortunately the poem was lost long ago.
According to our histories keeper, the portion of the Edda dealing with King Olaf might still exist in Dead Men's Respite. I need you to retrieve the poem.

MC183: a youngster who wants to become an adventurer

plots: Hunter wants reputation

quest.title: The Call of Adventure
quest.objective: bring a sword and a suit of armor to Hunter
tasks: Go to .
Go to .
obtain a sword
obtain a suit of armor
bring a sword and a suit of armor to Hunter
quest.description:
I do not want to spend my whole life in this village! I want to become an adventurer, like you. Maybe even make a name for myself...
Can you please help me start my life as an adventurer? I just need a sword and a suit of armor to keep myself save from danger. You can get swords from weaponsmiths and armor from armorers.
I collected some amethyst shards when I was a child dreaming of adventure. You can have them. You may yet find a use for them.

TESS571: the god of secrets and hidden knowledge
TESS572: the devious demon of forbidden knowledge
TESS573: books created by Hermaeus Mora, each containing forbidden knowledge

plots: the player asked Neloth if he has found more Black Books
the Black Book might contain the final secrets of Xarxes

quest.title: Lost Knowledge
quest.objective: retrieve a Black Book so that Neloth can make a copy of it
tasks: Go to Benkongerike.
find the Black Book
retrieve a Black Book so that Neloth can make a copy of it
quest.description:
Yes. Hermaeus Mora is devious, but then so am I. Now, it's only a rumor of a whisper of a conjecture. But I think this is the place. Benkongerike. One of the Books is hidden there.
Now, hurry and find that Black Book. That Book might contain the final secrets of Xarxes, for all we know. I'll just make a copy for myself. It's far too dangerous to carry the real Black Book around.
Of course, I'm sure you can handle yourself. Of course you can. You can keep the original Black Book.

BG230: a man who has been poisoned
the entrance to the large orange building
BG231: large orange building, in the southwest part of the Docks District
large orange building, in the southwest part of the Docks District
the entrance to the large orange building
BG232: the entrance to the large orange building
BG233: the entrance to the large orange building
the entrance to the large orange building

plots: Renfeld has friends nearby in a large orange building

quest.title: Bring the Poisoned Man to his Friends
quest.objective: save Renfeld from dying of poison
tasks: take Renfeld to Rylock
save Renfeld from dying of poison
quest.description:
My... my name is Renfeld...
*groan*
I have been poisoned...
I beg you to take me to... friends...
they have a building not far away from here... please, I beg you! It is a large building...
a large orange building in the southwest part of the Docks District.
There will be a man guarding the door... his name is Rylock. Please, take me to him...
I... I have nothing to offer you... aside from my gratitude and those of my friends.
Please... I do not have much time...

TESO472: an old man who used to be a warrior

plots: the player asked Pranal to give them heavy armor training
Pranal wants to get a gift to Malene: Pranal gives the player 50 gold to cover the costs of the gift

quest.title: Heavy Armor Training
quest.objective: get some useful items to Pranal, and talk to him
tasks: get a silver pitcher, and a set of four glasses
get some useful items to Pranal, and talk to him
quest.description:
You desire heavy armor training from me? Goodness me, I'm retired! I'm afraid combat doesn't interest me any more.
All that matters to me now is Malene. I'm no fool. I know she'd never be interested in an old man like me. It's enough just to be around her, to be in her company.
Well, if you're dead set on learning something from me, then how about you do a little something for me, first? Something for her, to be honest.
I'd like to get her a gift of a sort. Nothing terribly fancy, and something useful... How about a nice silver pitcher, and a set of four glasses. Here's 50 gold to cover the costs, that should be more than enough. Come see me when you've got everything, and we'll talk more.

BG1171: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep
BG1172: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep
the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep
BG1173: the pirate cove along the coast, south of Candlekeep

plots: Safana will join the player
Safana has a map that shows the location of Black Alaric's treasure

quest.title: Safana's Treasure Hunt
quest.objective: get Black Alaric's treasure for yourself and Safana
tasks: find Black Alaric's treasure with Safana
get Black Alaric's treasure for yourself and Safana
quest.description:
My name is Safana and I can make you richer than you could imagine.
I know where the pirate Black Alaric dumped his greatest trove of treasure. Knowing that you are a dynamic and intelligent person, I know you'd want to join me in a venture to get this treasure.
Well, we should be off then. From what my map showed, the pirate cove is located somewhere along the coast, just south of Candlekeep.

plots: Arkion was Nemphre's lover

quest.title: Arkion's Amulet
quest.objective: steal Arkion's amulet and bring it to Nemphre
tasks: find Arkion's amulet
steal Arkion's amulet and bring it to Nemphre
quest.description:
Mmm, be a sweet one. Could you do a favor for Nemphre?
An old lover of mine has followed me here to the city and has been threatening me with some very dark magic. His name is Arkion and, if you could just get a certain amulet of his to me, perhaps there are a few things I could do for you? Such as giving you a Scroll of Vampiric Touch, mmn?

plots: Larry wants comfort
the player is an enemy of Larry: the player hit Larry

quest.title: Taking Notes
quest.objective: give a book and quill to Larry
tasks: obtain a book and quill
give a book and quill to Larry
quest.description:
Don't you dare to scratch my books with your breath! I have not forgotten your vile deeds. Why did you even hit me?
You can make up for your violent nature, though. Bring me a book and quill, it should help with a little project of mine. I'd love to catalog my books in a more orderly fashion.
Help me out, and I'll forgive you for hitting me. I'd even give you an enchanted book.

BG2269: a worried father, who used to be a successful merchant in Calimshan
BG247: a great city to the south
BG2272: the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place
the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place
BG2273: the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place
BG2275: Marlowe's daughter, and a pure, young girl

plots: Marlowe requested the player to see him before
Vongoethe chased Marlowe and Malla here
Vongoethe desired Malla's soul: he stole it
Malla lies near death, and there is nothing the local priestess can do to help her
the monks sealed off the cavern rather than getting Marlowe's daughter's soul
the guard guarding the cavern will let in whomever Marlowe asks

quest.title: The Graveyard Lich
quest.objective: save Malla by returning her soul to her
tasks: Go to .
kill Vongoethe
save Malla by returning her soul to her
quest.description:
Welcome to my humble accommodations, adventurer. Will you hear out my tale?
As I said before, my name is Marlowe... I hail from Calimshan to the south, where I was a merchant. A successful one. I... suppose that is where I first came into contact with Vongoethe.
Vongoethe is a lich, adventurer. A powerful one. In Calimshan, there are many strange wonders of magic, and Vongoethe is not out of place. It is he who has chased us here, hunting us mercilessly. Vongoethe desired my poor Malla, my daughter. She is the young woman here on the bed. A... a good girl, a virgin and pure of heart. He desired her soul, he said, so I fled Calimshan with her. But he caught up to us nevertheless. And somehow he has taken her soul despite my efforts! She... she lies near death, and there is nothing the local priestess can do to help her. I know Vongoethe is in the cavern that serves as a graveyard in this place. I told the monks about him... but they sealed off the cavern rather than somehow getting my daughter's soul back as I had hoped.
Malla is the world to me! And I do not know how much longer Vongoethe will remain trapped in that cavern... he could already be loose! He will kill me and keep Malla's soul, I am sure of it!
Getting inside the cavern is not a problem. I... paid the guard there what little money I have left. I had thought to... try and get Malla's soul myself. But the guard will let in whomever I ask him to.
I have no coin left to offer you. I have bankrupted myself in trying to flee the lich's reach. But... Vongoethe himself is a powerful wizard. Surely he has items that would interest you, that you could take from him!

plots: the player is torturing their prisoner
the player's prisoner has hidden her inheritance

quest.title: The Inheritance
quest.objective: find the hidden treasure for yourself
tasks: get your prisoner's treasure from a hollowed-out tree stump
find the hidden treasure for yourself
quest.description:
Why are you people doing this? Is it information you want?
This... this is about the inheritance, isn't it? All right! I'll tell you where I've hidden it. It's in a hollowed-out tree stump. In the marsh, south of Solitude. Now please, you'll let me go now. Right?
Why don't you be a dear and let me go now. All right? I won't say a word to anyone. Our little secret. I promise.

TESS126: a province where Neloth has made many enemies

plots: Neloth gives the player a ring: it will light up the source of the ash spawn attacks when the player gets close to it

quest.title: Old Friends
quest.objective: find the person who summoned ash spawns and made them attack Neloth
tasks: wear the ring Neloth gave you to find the source of the ash spawns
find the person who summoned ash spawns and made them attack Neloth
quest.description:
I'm under attack. There are too many coincidences. There must be someone behind all of my recent troubles.
I have enemies. Legions of them back in Morrowind. However, in this case I have reason to believe it is someone in Solstheim. First I need to identify the culprit. I've enchanted this ring to find the source of the attacks. Here, take it.
Just wear the ring I gave you. It will light up the source when you get close to it. I enchanted the ring with a bit of ash from the last ash spawn attack. It can follow the magical link back to its summoner.

TESS371: a paranoid man who hates the Empire
TESS6: a province of the Empire that might break out of the Empire
TESS43: the capital city of Skyrim, under Imperial rule

plots: Dengeir of Stuhn thinks that Lod wrote a letter to General Tullius

quest.title: Imperial Spy?
quest.objective: give Lod's letter to Dengeir of Stuhn
tasks: Go to .
steal Lod's letter
give Lod's letter to Dengeir of Stuhn
quest.description:
There's a plot. Not against me. Against all of Falkreath. Those Imperial bastards are spying on every one of us.
Last night I saw Lod the blacksmith writing a letter. Probably sending word to Solitude and General Tullius. Are you loyal to Skyrim? Break into Lod's house and get that letter.
The Empire is probably making Lod smith up more swords and armor for them.

plots: Elena wants reputation
Elena has heard that the player helps people
powerful creepers are somehow related to obtaining the zombie heads

quest.title: Head Hunter
quest.objective: bring 5 zombie heads to Elena
tasks: obtain 5 zombie heads
bring 5 zombie heads to Elena
quest.description:
I want all monsters in this world know how much I hate them. Perhaps I could get some of their heads to show my disdain toward them. Zombie heads should show all zombies that I am not to be trifled with.
You will certainly help me; many people in this village have told me that you are a resourceful and eager to work. Bring me five zombie heads. Powerful creepers are somehow related to getting the heads, but I don't know how exactly.
Get me the heads, and I'll give you wings that let you soar the skies: an Elytra.

plots: Talos worship is outlawed in the Empire: when they buried Torygg, Elisif the Fair made offerings to all the gods except Talos

quest.title: Elisif's Tribute
quest.objective: help Elisif the Fair make the offering to Talos to complete her husband's burial
tasks: take Torygg's war horn to the shrine
help Elisif the Fair make the offering to Talos to complete her husband's burial
quest.description:
There's something... personal... I was hoping you would do for me.
As you may know Talos worship is outlawed in the Empire. When we buried my husband I made offerings to all the gods... except Talos. My husband Torygg would want a proper burial.
I would like you to take an item of his, a war horn handed down from his father, and place it at a Shrine of Talos.
It would mean a lot to me.

plots: the player helped Elmus and the others reclaim the Thirsk Mead Hall from monsters

quest.title: Berries for Elmus
quest.objective: retrieve some juniper berries for Elmus
tasks: Go to Skyrim.
find juniper berries
retrieve some juniper berries for Elmus
quest.description:
We lost most of the mead batches we had brewing when... before those things were here. One is just ready to take its turn, though, and it's about time to add some of the flavorings.
You can't find them on Solstheim, but if you find yourself back in Skyrim, I wouldn't mind you bringing some juniper berries.
They add a different kind of sweetness. Tart. Makes the flavor more round.

TESS130: a priest of Arkay and old, regretful elf

plots: Runil became a priest of Arkay after the Great War: many died by Runil's magics

quest.objective: retrieve Runil's journal for him
tasks: Go to Darkshade Copse.
find Runil's journal
retrieve Runil's journal for him
quest.description:
I am Runil, a priest of Arkay. I came into Arkay's light after the Great War. So many died by my hands, my magics.
I'm fortunate that Kust and the people of Falkreath have come to accept me as one of their own.
Could you do an old elf a favor? I misplaced my journal in a cave I was exploring. I'll pay for its return.
Blessing of Arkay to you for your help.

plots: the player is a noble
Tolmas Bendelia's caravan was waylaid by bandits
Tolmas Bendelia owns the deed to more than one local farmhold

quest.title: The Angry Merchant
quest.objective: find out why Tolmas Bendelia is angry
tasks: grant an audience to Tolmas Bendelia
find out why Tolmas Bendelia is angry
quest.description:
Greetings, Your Grace. I actually have a rather angry merchant by the name of Tolmas Bendelia that has been demanding to see you.
It might have something to do with his caravan being waylaid by bandits passing through the region, but he refuses to speak to anyone but Your Grace. He is an influential merchant in this area; I believe he owns the deed to more than one local farmhold. Will you grant this man an audience, my liege? I shall show him in.

BG1284: the former commander of the guard

plots: Commander Brage found a cursed sword and killed his family
Commander Brage was a well-liked man before the cursed sword changed him

quest.title: The Tale of Commander Brage
quest.objective: kill Commander Brage
tasks: find Commander Brage
kill Commander Brage
quest.description:
State your business with the guard and go! Oh, that came out a bit harsher than I meant. I am sorry for my mood. All the guard are still grieving the loss of Commander Brage.
The commander was friend to many before he found a cursed sword. He's not the man he was, by Helm. I'll not believe a man of Brage's rank could kill his own family. 'Twas evil magics of some sort. An entire unit went west after Brage to try to talk some sense to him. It's been a week, and none have returned.
The reward for the commander's head is a king's ransom, but I'll not be lifting MY sword against a brother soldier.
Travel lightly, wanderer. The woods harbor strange things.

plots: Edward wants knowledge

quest.title: Medical Breakthrough?
quest.objective: bring Edward's special healing potion to Pope
tasks: find Pope
bring Edward's special healing potion to Pope
quest.description:
I used to be an adventurer. I braved the depths of this world like no one else before me.
I still have one of my healing potions as a memento from those days of glory. That potion is quite special... Now that I think of it, the local cleric, Pope, might want to examine it for its peculiar properties. He could make some potent healing potions after researching my special potion.
Could you please find him, and give him the potion? The cleric will surely give you a small compensation fee.

TESO41: the prince of trickery and bargains, one of Daedric Princes
TESO43: a hero who had dealings with Clavicus Vile

plots: Umbra the Sword contains the soul of Umbra the Hero

quest.title: Clavicus Vile's Lost Sword
quest.objective: retrieve Umbra the Sword for Clavicus Vile
tasks: Go to Pell's Gate.
begin your search for Umbra the Sword
retrieve Umbra the Sword for Clavicus Vile
quest.description:
A mortal! Wonderful. Always a pleasure. I'm Clavicus Vile, the Prince of Trickery and Bargains.
Perhaps you'll do a service for me, mortal. And I'll reward you. A fair bargain, don't you think? You will retrieve for me a sword, a very special sword. It contains the soul of Umbra the Hero, a hero I have had dealings with in the past.
Bring the sword to me, and I'll reward you with my Masque. You'll not find a better bargain, mortal. Begin your search in Pell's Gate.

plots: the player saved Tirdir from a grave
Tirdir was kidnapped: the 3 men who kidnapped Tirdir buried him alive in the grave
Tirdir tore off something from the shirt of the youngest man dressed in red
the gravekeeper might have spoken to the man dressed in red

quest.title: Find the Kidnappers Who Buried Tirdir
quest.objective: find the 3 men who buried Tirdir alive
tasks: talk to the gravekeeper about the man dressed in red
find the 3 men who buried Tirdir alive
quest.description:
Thank you for saving me! I'm Tirdir. I was buried by the men who kidnapped me!
*cough* They held me for ransom from my family, and after my family had paid, they knocked me out. I remember being carried here and thrown into that grave next to another body! And then they buried me alive! *cough*
I don't know their names. There were three of them. The youngest carried me here. He dressed all in red... strange and bright as you please.
I woke up with this in my hand. I think I must have torn it off his shirt when he threw me in the grave. Perhaps it will help you find him.
You must stop them! I beg of you! There was someone who spoke to this man. Perhaps the gravekeeper. You should talk to him at least... he must have seen something!

TESS192: a captain of the Imperial Legion

plots: Captain Aldis trains recruits: he thought about asking some training books from the general

quest.title: Lessons on Defense
quest.objective: bring Captain Aldis a copy of "The Mirror"
tasks: find a copy of "The Mirror"
bring Captain Aldis a copy of "The Mirror"
quest.description:
I'm with the Imperial Legion. Train the recruits. Turn boys into men. That sort of thing.
Thinking of asking the General for some training books. Give the soldiers something to do while they're on rest. Something besides drinking. Ever seen a book called "The Mirror"? We used to hand it out to boys looking to learn basic shield work.
If you find a copy of "The Mirror", I'd be glad to have it. Then I'll see if I can get some copies made for the men.

plots: magical stone golems are known to be powerful and dangerous

quest.title: Find Mimic's Blood for Jermien the Cowled Wizard
quest.objective: bring Jermien the blood of a mimic so that he can complete his magical stone golem
tasks: find the blood of a mimic
bring Jermien the blood of a mimic so that he can complete his magical stone golem
quest.description:
I am none other than Jermien... licensed Cowled Wizard for this region.
I am working on a golem of stone! A fine piece of magical craftsmanship, if I do say so myself! Few other mages have made the attempt, you see. This type of golem is quite powerful and dangerous... but I am more than skilled enough to control it. Once it's complete, I'll have an excellent servant.
Trouble is, I'm missing one of the crucial ingredients... the blood of a mimic. I'd pay handsomely for some, in fact. Hmmm... you look like the adventurous type... care to find me some?
Hmm. I seem to recall that I've got a magical sword around here that I won in a bet from a certain fool. I've no use for it, but it's valuable. Find me some mimic's blood and it's yours.

TESS55: a fellow member of the Thieves Guild
TESS202: Mercer Frey's home in Riften, a gift from the Black-Briars after they kicked the previous family out
TESS203: a male guildmaster of the Thieves Guild who betrayed the Thieves Guild

plots: Mercer Frey never stays at Riftweald Manor: he hired Vald to guard Riftweald Manor
the player has the permission to kill anyone who stands in their way

quest.title: The Pursuit
quest.objective: search for clues about Mercer Frey's whereabouts
tasks: Go to Riftweald Manor.
break into Mercer Frey's house
search for clues about Mercer Frey's whereabouts
quest.description:
I have an important task for you. I need you to break into Mercer Frey's home and search for anything that could tell us where he's gone.
Mercer's house is in Riften. A gift from the Black-Briars after they kicked the previous family out... a place called Riftweald Manor. He never stays there, just pays for the upkeep on it. Hired some lout by the name of Vald to guard the place.
Be careful, kid. This is the last place in Skyrim I'd ever want to send you. Just find a way in, get the information and leave. And you have permission to kill anyone that stands in your way.

TL216: a woman, an old friend to the Destroyer

plots: the Alchemist destroyed Torchlight

quest.title: Warn the Estherians

find Commander Vale and let her know what happened
head up the pass to the Enclave, and warn the Estherians that the Alchemist is coming to them
quest.description:
Someone needs to warn the Estherians. Head up the pass to their Enclave. Find my old friend, Commander Vale, and let her know what happened.
Tell them that the Alchemist destroyed Torchlight, and is headed their way. He may be there already...

MC101: an Illager outpost tower in the nearby woods

plots: Xan wants knowledge
the player is a known villain

quest.title: Pillaging the Illagers
quest.objective: bring the plans of Illagers to Xan
tasks: Go to Deepwood Tower.
steal the plans of Illagers who threaten Fishing Hamlet
bring the plans of Illagers to Xan
quest.description:
No! Go away! Please don't kill me...
Illagers are making me scared enough already! Perhaps you'd like to do something villainous, and even net a reward for it?
This village, Fishing Hamlet, has been threatened by nearby Illagers of Deepwood Tower for some time. You could go to their tower in the woods and steal their plans.
Bring the plans to me, and I'll give you an enchanted sword as a reward. Just don't test its blade on me, please!

TESS83: a mine whose tunnels are getting deep into the rock
TESS805: a mine whose tunnels are getting deep into the rock
a mine whose tunnels are getting deep into the rock

plots: the miners need medicines to combat the ore dust

quest.title: A Bad Cough
quest.objective: deliver a message about medicines for miners to Quintus
tasks: Go to White Phial.
find Quintus
deliver a message about medicines for miners to Quintus
quest.description:
This mine is only a few years old, but I've been digging up ore for over a century.
We're getting to the point where the tunnels are getting deep into the rock. People complain of bad coughs and foul air. I've seen this before. We need some medicines to combat the ore dust. I was about to send a message to Windhelm for aid.
Could you deliver that message on my behalf? Take it to Quintus, in the White Phial.

TESS29: a fellow member of the Dawnguard
TESS935: a former priest of Arkay, and an eccentric, yet trustworthy man
TESS28: a man who never got along with Florentius, and the leader of the Dawnguard
TESS21: a male member of the Dawnguard

plots: Gunmar and Sorine Jurard think that the Dawnguard are going to need Florentius to help against the vampires
Florentius had regular contact with the Vigilants: Isran has kept track of the Vigilants

quest.title: Bolstering the Ranks
quest.objective: find Florentius and recruit him into the Dawnguard
tasks: ask Isran whether he knows where Florentius is
find Florentius and recruit him into the Dawnguard
quest.description:
These vampires are a new threat, and a truly deadly one. Gunmar and I agree that we're going to need Florentius to help.
Gunmar and I have a lot of work to do here, so we were hoping that maybe you could track him down. He's a priest of Arkay. Well, he was. It's... it's complicated. Florentius's a little eccentric, but we can trust him and we could definitely use his skills.
Here's the thing. We don't know where Florentius is. Haven't seen him in years. I think he had regular contact with the Vigilants, and I know Isran kept track of them... So maybe you could ask Isran if he knows anything?
Just keep in mind that Isran... well, he might not like the idea. The two of them just never got along.

plots: Dean wants knowledge
Dean has heard that the player helps people

quest.title: New Materials
quest.objective: bring 10 scutes to Dean
tasks: obtain 10 scutes from turtles
bring 10 scutes to Dean
quest.description:
I have made all sorts of things from leather: tunics, hats, and even little tent-houses. There's nothing new I can create...
Could you perhaps help me out of this sea of creative depression? You do help people? Please find me a new material to work with! Perhaps turtle scutes would work...
Please help me get my hands on ten scutes: you can get them from turtles on sandy beaches. I'll give you a stack of leather for your services!

plots: there are guards on the streets: there's been a string of killings
the murderer has been killing paupers, sometimes in the alley where they sleep
the murderer flays his victims alive

quest.title: Solve the "Skinner" Murders
quest.objective: bring information about the murders to Lieutenant Aegisfield
tasks: find information about the murders
bring information about the murders to Lieutenant Aegisfield
quest.description:
I'm Lieutenant Aegisfield. I'm warning everyone so as to get the word out that there are guards on the streets. We've had a... a string of killings, and I don't want any more happening.
Bandits I can understand; they are easy enough to figure out. What's happening here is... it's murder, but not like I've ever seen. There's a disgustingly sick person out there, and I simply don't have the manpower to protect everyone. He's been killing paupers, sometimes in the alley where they sleep. They have nothing to take. He kills them and that is all. Not only is it pointless, but he does it in as painful a way as possible. It's... it's sick. He flays them... alive. There has been blood all over the area.
I must go about my rounds. If you find any information about the murders, be sure to let me know. Don't go looking for trouble though.

plots: Inkspot wants knowledge

quest.title: Connecting the Dots
quest.objective: bring Inkspot's map to Mapmaker, and return to Inkspot
tasks: Go to Rivermouth.
find Mapmaker
bring Inkspot's map to Mapmaker, and return to Inkspot
quest.description:
Oh my! I'm supposed to deliver a map of mine to one of my colleagues in another village, but I just can't ever spare the time
You seen to have a lot of time on your hands. Could you please deliver my map to Mapmaker in Rivermouth? He'd be grateful to you; he has wanted to examine this particular map for a long time. Upon your return, I'd give you a little something for your help.

MC2: a ruined portal not for from the village
MC105: a ruined portal not for from the village
a ruined portal not for from the village

plots: Reverend Revan wants knowledge

quest.title: Sinister Worship
quest.objective: investigate the cultists for Reverend Revan
tasks: Go to .
spy on the cultists
investigate the cultists for Reverend Revan
quest.description:
There is a ruined portal not far from the village. My fellow villagers have seen some ominous-looking people, possibly cultists, near the portal. I am a servant of the Gods: I can't let dark cultists conduct their sinister rituals.
I'd like you to investigate these cultists: you are a stranger, thus unknown to them. Who are they? What are their intentions? You should start by heading out to the ruined portal, and spying on those cultists.
I have put aside a healing potion for you. Hopefully, you won't need to consume it immediately after your return. Godspeed to you. May you always walk on the path of light.

TESS910: an old tomb that is said to hold a treasure that bestows great power on the one who discovers it

plots: Medresi Dran's work force ran away while excavating Angarvunde: they opened a chamber full of undead

quest.title: Medresi Dran and the Wandering Dead
quest.objective: discover the treasure of Angarvunde
tasks: clear the main chamber of restless undead
discover the treasure of Angarvunde
quest.description:
I'm on the verge of incredible wealth, but my cowardly work force ran at the first sign of danger. We were excavating this old tomb when we opened a chamber full of corpses. The team took one look, turned tail, and ran.
Legend says this tomb holds a treasure that bestows great power on the one who discovers it. Beyond that, not much more is known. Obviously, this treasure will fetch a good deal of gold, and I'm willing to let you share in the reward when we find it.
I'll tell you what. You help me get the treasure and I'll split it with you. First, I need you to clear the main chamber of those restless dead. I'll stay here until you're finished, planning our next move.
With my brains and your brawn, that treasure will soon be mine... uh, ours.

TESS633: a man who is expecting reinforcements
TESS22: Stalleo's home fortress, overrun by bandits
TESS635: a man who has been at odds with Stalleo since the king's death

plots: Stalleo and his men left to help with the war: meanwhile Brurid and his bandits seized Treva's Watch and kidnapped Stalleo's family

quest.title: Infiltration
quest.objective: help Stalleo to take back Treva's Watch from bandits
tasks: Go to Treva's Watch.
use the mine entrance behind Stalleo and his men, and open the front gate
help Stalleo to take back Treva's Watch from bandits
quest.description:
Are you here to help? Finally, reinforcements have arrived. I was expecting more though, you'd better be good.
We left to help with the war and these filth bags swooped in and seized the place. I suspect Brurid planned this, there's been bad blood between us since the king's death. But to invade my home, kidnap my family...
The front gate is locked so you'll need to use the mine entrance behind us. Open the front gate and we'll try and give you some support. My family is everything to me. Clear the fort and on top of the posted reward you can have whatever items you'd like.

TESS609: a mill ran by Hern and Hert
TESS610: a male vampire who has blended into the human society

plots: Hert is always near Hern

quest.title: Undead to Plain Dead
quest.objective: assassinate Hern
tasks: Go to Half-Moon Mill.
find Hern
assassinate Hern
quest.description:
You are going to assassinate Hern. He's a vampire, and has blended into human society for years. He's never far from his female companion, Hert. Also a vampire.
The contract is for the male, Hern. But you'll probably have to contend with the female, too. They both live in Half-Moon Mill. So for Sithis' sake, watch yourself.
Face a vampire, and live to tell the tale!

TESS844: Clavicus Vile's dog who was kicked out by Clavicus Vile
TESS845: a den of cultists worshiping Clavicus Vile
TESS846: the prince of wishes, a Daedra

plots: Clavicus Vile is weak, since he banished Barbas: Clavicus Vile can only manifest at his shrines

quest.title: A Daedra's Best Friend
quest.objective: settle the disagreement between Barbas and Clavicus Vile
tasks: Go to Haemar's Shame.
talk to Clavicus Vile at his shrine
settle the disagreement between Barbas and Clavicus Vile
quest.description:
You are exactly what I was looking for. You see, my name is Barbas. And I have a problem I think you can help sort out.
My master and I had a bit of a falling out. We got into an argument and it got rather... heated. He's kicked me out until I find someone who can settle our disagreement. That's where you come in.
My master is Clavicus Vile, the prince of wishes. As you can imagine, he's quite the important person.  Now, since he banished me, Vile's been rather weak. He can't manifest very far from one of his shrines. I know there's a cult that worships him at Haemar's Shame. We should be able to talk to him there.
If this works out, I'll make sure you're rewarded. Just don't trust any offer he makes you... okay?

plots: Bolli sells his catch across Skyrim

quest.title: Special Delivery
quest.objective: help Bolli sell his fish to an untapped market
tasks: Go to The Silver Blood Inn.
deliver a purchase agreement to Kleppr
help Bolli sell his fish to an untapped market
quest.description:
I'm Bolli, a fisherman.
I sell my catch across a good portion of Skyrim... it's worth its weight in gold to me. The only untapped market left is Markarth. However, I just got word that Kleppr at The Silver Blood Inn might be interested.
If you're headed that way, I would appreciate you delivering a purchase agreement for me. You'd be paid, of course. Kleppr will pay you as soon as you arrive with the letter. Here you are.

BG2177: Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here
BG2178: Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here
Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here
BG237: Garren Windspear's cabin, a short distance south of here

plots: Garren Windspear saw the player change their shape
Garren Windspear observed the player kill knights who looked like beasts: priests of Helm will seek justice and only the player's head will suffice

quest.title: The Mystery of Monster Knights
quest.objective: discover why you were tricked to kill knights
tasks: take sanctuary with Garren Windspear
discover why you were tricked to kill knights
quest.description:
I'm Garren Windspear. What goes on here? I've seen many a strange thing in my time, but the events of the past few moments tops them all.
Who are you that can change shape so readily, and why have you slain these beasts that become men?
It appears that you have been tricked into killing these knights! Though the priests of Helm will not believe what has happened. They will seek justice, and only your head will suffice.
I suggest that you take sanctuary with me until you can discover how this unfortunate event came to pass. My cabin is but a short distance south of here. I will meet you there.

TL2108: one of the Guardians, drained by the Alchemist
TL238: a male pawn of the Netherim

plots: Guardian of the Wild fears that the Alchemist uses the power of the Guardians to open a portal to the Nether Realm, plunging the world into eternal chaos

quest.title: Return to the Enclave
quest.objective: stop the Alchemist before he can drain the two Guardians in the Ossean Wastes
tasks: Go to Enclave.
talk to Commander Vale about getting to the Ossean Wastes
stop the Alchemist before he can drain the two Guardians in the Ossean Wastes
quest.description:
I fear the Alchemist is a pawn of the Netherim. With the power of the Guardians, a portal to the Nether Realm could be thrown wide, and the world would be plunged into an age of never-ending torment.
Return to the Enclave immediately. Commander Vale can help you secure passage to the Ossean Wastes, where two of my fellow Guardians can be found. Stop the Alchemist before he can drain them as well!

MC130: an ocean ruin far west of here
MC131: an ocean ruin far west of here
an ocean ruin far west of here

plots: Jane wants knowledge
the player is a famous hero

quest.title: That Belongs to a Library!
quest.objective: recover writings of a lost culture for Jane
tasks: find the writings of a lost culture
recover writings of a lost culture for Jane
quest.description:
There are ruins scattered on both land and the bottom of the sea, hero. These ruins tell us many things about the people who inhabited them: their hardships and hopes.
I'm not a hero like you, just your everyday librarian. I know of a submerged ruin in an ocean far west of here that you could explore. I implore you: find writings of a lost culture that lived in the ruin. The writings will be reduced to a lump of watery paper, if we don't recover them in time.
I have some unused bookshelves that I could give you in return. Even heroes need to civilize themselves with quality literature sometimes.

TESO336: the player's friend, and the future Emperor
TESO337: an evil man serving Mehrunes Dagon
TESO424: the head of the Elder Council

plots: Martin sent a messenger to High Chancellor Ocato while the player was killing Mankar Camoran
the Elder Council rules in the Emperor's absence: they should not object to crowning Martin the Emperor

quest.title: Light the Dragonfires
quest.objective: light the Dragonfires with Martin to close the Gates of Oblivion and stop Mehrunes Dagon's invasion
tasks: Go to Imperial City.
escort Martin to High Chancellor Ocato, who is waiting for you both
light the Dragonfires with Martin to close the Gates of Oblivion and stop Mehrunes Dagon's invasion
quest.description:
While you were gone, I sent a messenger to High Chancellor Ocato. He waits for us in the Imperial City.
Chancellor Ocato is the head of the Elder Council. The Council rules in the Emperor's absence. I don't expect any objections from the Elder Council, but we should defer to their authority.
Let's go to the Imperial City at once, before the enemy can recover from Mankar Camoran's death. Until we light the Dragonfires, the Gates are open, and Mehrunes Dagon's invasion continues.

TESS403: an officer of the Imperial Legion
TESS406: the last great bastion of the Dragon Cult

plots: the general sent Captain Valmir to obtain a powerful weapon for the war effort
dragons granted terrible power to the Dragon Cult for their bloody sacrifices: they were swept out during the dragon war because of their cruelty

quest.title: Siege on the Dragon Cult
quest.objective: recover the Dragon Cult leader's mask for Captain Valmir
tasks: find the Dragon Cult leader's mask
recover the Dragon Cult leader's mask for Captain Valmir
quest.description:
You there! As an officer of the Imperial Legion, I require your assistance to complete my mission.
The General has sent me to obtain a powerful weapon for the war effort. This was the last great bastion of the Dragon Cult, and their leader's mask was reported to be quite powerful.
They were among the first men to arrive from Atmora and they worshiped certain animals as avatars of the Gods; Dragons being foremost. And for their bloody sacrifices, the Dragons gifted their priests with terrible power. But their cruelty was too great for men to bear, and they rose up in what would be called the Dragon War and the Cult swept from the land.
I'll pay for the Dragon Cult leader's mask. Get in there, find the mask, return it to me, and earn your pay.

TESO202: a man who desperately wants to die

plots: Hirrus Clutumnus is  going to go about his daily life

quest.title: Final Resting
quest.objective: help Hirrus Clutumnus end his life
tasks: kill Hirrus Clutumnus when he is unaware
help Hirrus Clutumnus end his life
quest.description:
Won't someone end me? Take my life, please!
I, Hirrus Clutumnus, am in desperate need of a champion, a hero. Are you brave and fearless? There's a... a simple task. Yes, a simple task that you must perform.
This life, it's... well, it's too painful. Everywhere I look, I see death, dying, and decay. When I dream, I see a world without sunshine. I'm constantly on the verge of retching up, or falling asleep, or screaming at someone who doesn't deserve it. I'm just so fed up with it all.
I need your help. I need you to send my soul away from this world! You must... you must kill me. I don't necessarily want to see it coming. And I want to die here in the city so all these people finally believe me. They'll wish they were nicer. You probably want to do it without spectators though, so you don't get in trouble. Best to make it look like an accident. But remember, I don't want to see it coming. Take me unaware!
I'm going to go about my daily life, such as it is, as if nothing has changed. Make your move when you wish. But, please, do it soon. When you kill me, take the key to my house. Nothing really worth taking, except what's locked up in the jewelry box. You can have that.

plots: the player freed Malo from bandits

quest.title: An Enchanter in Chains
quest.objective: get your reward from Malo

go see Malo
get your reward from Malo
quest.description:
Oh, thank you so much!  Here I was, afraid I'd never enchant anything ever again!
I'm was on my way to the Estherian Enclave when these brigands ambushed me. Once I gather my wits, I'll head over there. Come by and see me, if you get a chance! I'll have a reward for you.

plots: Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring is cursed

quest.title: Arcand the Mad
quest.objective: bring Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring to him
tasks: find Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring
bring Mad Arcand the Stinking's ring to him
quest.description:
I like you, yes I do (wertle, wertle, wertle, wooo...) and I know of a way to make you like me too (wertle, wertle, wertle-wooooo...).
Down by the ocean, down by the sea, there's a pirate ship waiting for you and for me. Bring me what's in it, but don't ever wear it, or sure enough, soon enough, you'll wertle too... A beautiful ring! Where to get it? (Most likely quite near where exactly I put it...) Wertle, oh wertle, oh dear wertle-wooo... wertle, oh wertle, oh woo...
Oh, I know what you're thinking of Mad Arcand the Stinking who takes what you give him and gives not in return. So there is this bottle, but please don't topple or (wertle, poor wertle), you'll surely get burned.

MC160: a terrible fortress in the Nether, inhabited by fierce creatures

plots: Yves wants reputation

quest.title: Tales of Terror
quest.objective: visit a Nether Fortress, and report back to Yves
tasks: Go to Nether.
Go to Nether Fortress.
go to the Nether
find a Nether Fortress
visit a Nether Fortress, and report back to Yves
quest.description:
I love to tell stories to others. I'd like to bolster my reputation as a storyteller with some novel, unheard stories about the Nether. To recount its dangers and hellish nature...
A witness' account of a Nether Fortress would help me devise some dashing tales. A terrible fortress with equally terrible inhabitants...
Would you be my witness? Please, go to the Nether and find a Nether Fortress. Visit it, and tell me all about it. I'll have a diamond for you. It should entice you to help me.

plots: Dave wants knowledge
suspicious stew is mushroom stew laced with some flowers: it may have positive or negative effects on its eater

quest.title: Nothing Suspicious...
quest.objective: see what happens after eating suspicious stew, and report back to Dave

see what happens after eating suspicious stew, and report back to Dave
quest.description:
I keep the villagers fed. Without my crops, our village would surely face a famine!
Sometimes, I like to cook new foods using various natural ingredients to prepare us for poor harvests. This time, I tried to make some mushroom stew, but one of the villagers accidentally tripped, and dropped some flowers into the pot with the stew.
Traveler, could you please taste the suspicious mushroom stew? It can have either positive or negative effects on its eater. I'm giving you some.
Please see what happens after eating the suspicious stew, and report back to me. I'd hate to throw away the whole batch of mushroom stew for nothing. I'll even give you 10 emeralds for being a taster.

plots: Nathan and his friends disappeared some days ago

quest.title: Farmer Brun's Missing Son
quest.objective: find Nathan
tasks: Go to .
inspect tracks
find Nathan
quest.description:
I beseech thee, kind soul, please help.
I'm farmer Brun. It's strange happenings at my farm, and I've not the strength I once had. I've nothing to offer, and even if I did I doubt such as you would have need of it. My son Nathan and his friends went looking for our missing cattle, then they just up and disappeared! Been gone for days now and, with all the bandits around, who knows what's happened. I don't know where they were heading, but I saw some sort o' tracks to the west.
Please find Nathan. I can't afford to keep the farm without my son.

It may not be "official", but there is a, uhh, project I've been working on. I wonder if perhaps you could assist with it.
Just... Just bring me some Dwemer Cogs. I need to examine them for the methods used in forging them. Ten of them should be enough for me to get a better understanding of how they were crafted. That's all I need, all right?

TESS225: the evil god of the Mythic Dawn

plots: after the Oblivion crisis, a number of groups cropped up dedicated to wiping out the remnants of the Mythic Dawn: one of the groups found Mehrunes' Razor and split it into three fragments almost 150 years ago
the descendants of the group still have the fragments of Mehrunes' Razor: Silus Vesuius gives the player his notes on the owners

quest.title: Pieces of the Past
quest.objective: retrieve the scattered pieces of Mehrunes' Razor for Silus Vesuius
tasks: find Ghunzul, Drascua, and Jorgen, the owners of the pieces of Mehrunes' Razor
retrieve the scattered pieces of Mehrunes' Razor for Silus Vesuius
quest.description:
I have a job you look perfect for.
A little history, first. After the Oblivion Crisis, a number of groups cropped up dedicated to wiping out the remnants of the Mythic Dawn. One of these groups found Mehrunes' Razor, the artifact of Mehrunes Dagon. They split it into three fragments and pledged to keep them apart forever. That was almost 150 years ago, and the pieces are still being kept by the descendants of that group. And they're right here, in Skyrim.
At least two of the owners, Ghunzul and Drascua, are dangerous marauders. And the third owner, Jorgen, I only know he lives in Morthal.
Here are my notes about them. I'll gladly pay you for getting the pieces any way you can. No questions asked.

TL2121: the innermost part of the Swarm Point

plots: Hareph sent the player to find his demolition crew: he gave the player explosives
some Skara hives seem to be infected with something

quest.title: Blight of the Bugs
quest.objective: discover what has been blighting Skara eggs
tasks: Go to Brood Hive.
find the rigged Skara hives and detonate them
destroy all infected eggs
discover what has been blighting Skara eggs
quest.description:
Ah, Hareph sent you with some explosives. Finally some good news!
Don't bother looking for the rest of the crew - I'm the only one that survived. 
There's something wrong with some of the Skara hives - they seem to be infected. You'll need to locate the rigged hives and detonate them, then descend into the Brood Hive itself and destroy any infected eggs you find. Perhaps you will discover what has been blighting the eggs!
This is a great task, but it must be done. We will all be in your debt.

BG2250: a woman, and Shadowmaster of Eastern Esmeltaran
BG263: a guildmaster of the Shadow Thieves

plots: the player is a Shadowmaster of the Shadow Thieves
Sir Greshal has been trying to muscle into a relationship with the Shadow Thieves
Sir Greshal wishes to be introduced to a Shadow Thieves' contact here in the city: that contact will be the player
Ama will dispense a runner to get Sir Greshal after the player meets her

quest.title: Government Relations
quest.objective: help Ama kill Sir Greshal
tasks: Go to Waukeen's Promenade.
meet Ama after dark
help Ama kill Sir Greshal
quest.description:
My name is Ama, and I am Shadowmaster of Eastern Esmeltaran.
I would like you to participate in a little rendezvous and help in the removal of a pest. There is a government official, Sir Greshal, causing us no end of trouble with his tariffs and spot checks on caravans. This fool thinks he can stifle the thieving trade of an entire city. He has been trying to muscle into a relationship with the Shadow Thieves, and while we could pay, it is better that we send a message to any of his cohorts. I have come here with a promise of granting his wishes, but I only want to lure him away from his palisade defenses. This is where you come in.
Sir Greshal wishes to be introduced to a contact here in the city, and that contact will be you. The meeting is already set up, and when he arrives, we will take him by surprise. You are known somewhat in this place, if not as a guildmaster. He will believe you are a legitimate contact. He seems willing to believe anything, so long as it is theatrical.
It will be any evening that is best for you. I will await you in Waukeen's Promenade after dark and then dispense a runner to get Sir Greshal. The suddenness will seem dramatic to him.

TESO357: outside Glarthir's house in Skingrad at 6 am
TESO356: outside Glarthir's house in Skingrad at 6 am
outside Glarthir's house in Skingrad at 6 am
TESO358: a woman who has been kind to Glarthir

plots: the player came to meet with Glarthir
Glarthir thinks that everyone in Skingrad is watching him
the player should not contact Glarthir in public

quest.title: Paranoia
quest.objective: check out some people for Glarthir
tasks: Go to .
see where Bernadette Peneles goes and what she does
meet Glarthir again tomorrow night
check out some people for Glarthir
quest.description:
Ah, you came. You're sure you weren't followed? Good, I thought I could trust you. Nobody else in town.
They're all in on it ... all watching me. Well. Yes. I need you to do something for me. I'll pay you -- gold. You like gold, don't you? Lots of gold.
Here's my problem. I'm being followed. Watched. Marukhati Selectives, maybe. Not sure. I'm a threat, you see? To their plans. I know too much. I need you to check out some people for me, the ones that are following me. Watch them, see where they go, who they report to. Will you help me?
Today I caught Bernadette Peneles watching me. I have very little doubt now that she is one of them. This saddens me. I had thought her one of the few to show me kindness in this nest of treachery. But now it seems that it was all a lie.
Be outside my house at 6 am, you'll see her watching me. See where she goes and who she reports to. We'll meet here again tomorrow night. Oh, and NEVER contact me in public. They're watching. They can't know you're helping me.

TESO159: the player's superior in the Fighters Guild

TESO459: one of the leaders of the Blackwood Company
TESO409: the female leader of the Fighters Guild

capture Ajum-Kajin
bring Ajum-Kajin to Modryn Oreyn so that Modryn Oreyn can "persuade" Ajum-Kajin to talk
quest.description:
These certainly won't be official duties. Fact is, you'll likely be expelled from the Guild if Vilena gets wind of the fact that you're here. And I've already been expelled. Doesn't mean I'm done, though.
I'm taking down the Blackwood Company, and I want your help doing it. To bring them down, I need more information. My sources tell me they're trying to expand, and they've set up camp in Glademist Cave. I want you to go there and capture Ajum-Kajin, one of their leaders. Bring him back to me. I'd like to spend some time... talking to him.

TL2100: an evil man who has stolen the energy of three Guardians

plots: the player thought that the Dark Alchemist is after the Guardian Of Air's power: he left the desert for Grunnheim

quest.title: On to Grunnheim!

tasks: speak to the Railmaster, and depart to Grunnheim
defeat the Dark Alchemist before he gets to the Clockwork Core
quest.description:
Let us return to the matter of the Dark Alchemist. He has now stolen the energy of three Guardians, and we thought he desired my power as well. But, for some reason, he has left the desert, and is now en route to Grunnheim.
That can only mean that he is bound for the Clockwork Core. With the power he has amassed, he could destroy the barrier between our world and the realm of the Netherim. They would pour through by the millions.
Seek the Railmaster, and depart for Grunnheim as soon as you are able.

TESS468: a fellow member of the College of Winterhold
TESS469: a powerful male mage gifted in restoration

quest.objective: learn more about restoration magic from the Augur

learn more about restoration magic from the Augur
quest.description:
Look at you. Such a devoted student of Restoration. It's comforting to see that not everyone has dismissed it as entirely as most members of the College. Truly comforting.
It looks like you're ready to speak with the Augur. He was a brilliant mage. Truly inspired. Mastered spells others could barely comprehend. He was especially gifted when it came to Restoration.
The Augur's... Well, he's very particular about who shares the knowledge. So you'll need his approval first. Go on, go talk to him. I'm sure he's been paying attention, and will be expecting you.

TL2209: a great bard who received a blow to the head in Torchlight
TL248: a city in Veras that was destroyed

plots: Trill is known throughout Veras: from Torchlight to Redhaven

quest.title: The Three Sisters
quest.objective: find the 3 sisters
tasks: investigate a tree trunk in an area full of spiders
find the 3 sisters
quest.description:
Greetings! I am the great bard Trill. You've heard of me of course, my talent is known throughout all of Veras. From Torchlight to Redhaven they sing of my.. songs.
Torchlight... did something happen there? I feel a bit... Ah, nevermind. I recognize this place!
The spiders called, the Sisters three, the old trunk yawning wide,
Through ancient halls, dark ancestry, they met their fates inside.
An apt verse, you'll agree. I wrote it myself of course.
The rest of the song eludes me... Leniency please! Of course such a lapse is unforgivable in a great bard such as myself, but I feel a bit.. off.
Still, even that bare fragment of verse can lead you to glory. Go forth, brave warrior, and slay the mighty beasts! Whatever they may be...

TESS393: a scholar, giving quest via "Heddic's Volunruud Notes"
TESS396: an ancient warrior, and a forefather of Heddic Volunnar

TESS398: favored weapons when Tongue Chieftain Kvenel went into battle

plots: Heddic Volunnar is scouting out Volunruud: the relief not far from the entrance hides Tongue Chieftain Kvenel's tomb
the two hidden keys to Tongue Chieftain Kvenel's tomb are ceremonial replicas of Okin and Eduj

quest.title: Silenced Tongues
quest.objective: unlock the burial chamber of Tongue Chieftain Kvenel
tasks: find the two hidden keys
unlock the burial chamber of Tongue Chieftain Kvenel
quest.description:
Heddic's Volunruud Notes
by Heddic Volunnar

I was skeptical, but it's obvious now. The old hymns had truth to them! The relief wasn't far from the entrance, just as they said. I've no doubt now that it hides the entrance to Kvenel's tomb.
The two keys must be hidden somewhere nearby - ceremonial replicas of Okin and Eduj, favored weapons when Kvenel went into battle. I don't dare explore further without hiring bodyguards to accompany me, however. To think - The Tongue Chieftain Kvenel could be entombed behind just a few feet of stone! The ancestor we scarcely believed was real.
Twice damned for planning this foolish scouting trip. I should have hired those sellswords in the first place. Perhaps there's no need. This place is just a tomb, after all, and there are no obvious signs of habitation. It isn't as though the thousand-year dead will mind if I have a look around.

TESS55: the player's superior in the Thieves Guild
TESS563: an arrogant wood elf man who owns the Goldenglow Estate
TESS564: a powerful woman with criminal connections
TESS565: the man who leads the Thieves Guild

plots: the Thieves Guild had an arrangement with Maven: the Thieves Guild kept an eye on Goldenglow Estate to make sure the honey kept flowing, and Maven allowed the Thieves Guild to extort Aringoth and bring in a huge payout
Aringoth stopped sending the Thieves Guild extortion money: Mercer was angry
the player may kill Aringoth, but Maven would prefer him alive

quest.title: Loud and Clear
quest.objective: teach Aringoth a lesson
tasks: Go to Goldenglow Estate.
burn down three bee hives without burning the whole Goldenglow Estate down, and clear out the safe in the main house of the Goldenglow Estate
teach Aringoth a lesson
quest.description:
Goldenglow Estate is a bee farm; they raise the wretched little things for honey. It's owned by some smart-mouth wood elf named Aringoth.
We had an arrangement with Maven. We kept an eye on Goldenglow Estate to make sure the honey kept flowing. In return, Maven allowed us to extort Aringoth and bring in a huge payout.
Goldenglow Estate brought in a mountain of gold for the Guild. You could almost call it our sweetest deal. Then out of the clear blue, Aringoth stops sending us our cut. Mercer was... well, angry to put it kindly.
We need you to teach Aringoth a lesson by burning down three of the estate's hives and clearing out the safe in the main house. The catch is that you can't burn the whole place to the ground. Maven would be furious if you did. She also prefers that Aringoth remains alive, but if he tries to stop you from getting the job done, kill him.
The Guild has a lot riding on this. Don't make me look foolish by mucking it up.

TESS28: the male leader of the Dawnguard

plots: vampires are becoming a larger threat

quest.title: Dawnguard
quest.objective: join the Dawnguard
tasks: Go to Fort Dawnguard.
speak with Isran about joining the Dawnguard
join the Dawnguard
quest.description:
I'm Durak of the Dawnguard.
We are vampire hunters. We search out and destroy those bloodsucking scum wherever we find them. We are looking for anyone willing to fight against the growing vampire menace.
Everybody says that they are not interested about joining, right up until they find their throat being ripped out by a pack of hungry vampires.
Want to sign up to the Dawnguard and kill vampires? Go talk to Isran, our leader, at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften. He'll decide if you're Dawnguard material.

MC54: a mysterious place at the end of space and time

slay the Ender Dragon, and report back to Weak Will
quest.description:
Me useless moron, say many people of this village. Me want to seem like a hero instead. Would make I happier, less thinking of dying.
Me know!!! Go to The End. That strange place at the end. Kill that big meanie Ender Dragon. Tell I how you did it, and me can tell everyone me did it!
Me give you something cool for me white lie.

TESS52: the Jarl's or Steward's chambers in Dragonsreach
TESS640: the Jarl's or Steward's chambers in Dragonsreach
the Jarl's or Steward's chambers in Dragonsreach
TESS641: an old male warrior, and a close friend of Olfrid Battle-Born

plots: the player is a member of the Thieves Guild: the player was sent to do a job for Olfrid Battle-Born

the letter and the prison registry are inside : visitors are not allowed to enter them

quest.title: Imitation Amnesty
quest.objective: help Olfrid Battle-Born save Arn from getting executed for a serious crime in Solitude
tasks: Go to .
Go to .
steal a letter that was sent from Solitude warning the Whiterun guard to be on the lookout for Arn
change Arn's name in the prison registry to his new identity
help Olfrid Battle-Born save Arn from getting executed for a serious crime in Solitude
quest.description:
You're here! And not a moment too soon. If anything should happen to Arn, there'll be hell to pay.
Arn's a close friend of mine. We fought together on the battlefield for many years until old age got the better of us. Now it's up to me to save him one more time... this time from the executioner's block in Solitude.
The city guard in Solitude is seeking Arn for a serious crime. When he fled here, he was arrested for drunken behavior. Can you imagine? Fortunately, his identity isn't known to the authorities in Whiterun, so there's still a chance to save him.
The job is two-fold. First, steal a letter that was sent from Solitude warning Whiterun's guard to be on the lookout for Arn. The second is to change Arn's name in the prison registry to his new identity.
The job is relatively difficult. If it was easy, I would have hired a local thug instead of a professional from the Thieves Guild. You see both of these items are kept inside Dragonsreach, and they don't allow visitors inside the Jarl's or the Steward's chambers.
One more thing. If you get caught, I can't afford to be connected to you. Remember that before you do anything stupid.

plots: slaughterfish nearly took off Aelwin Merowald's leg
Aelwin Merowald could retire with the money he would get from the slaughterfish scales

quest.title: Go Fish
quest.objective: bring 12 slaughterfish scales to Aelwin Merowald
tasks: Go to Lake Rumare.
kill slaughterfish and collect their scales
bring 12 slaughterfish scales to Aelwin Merowald
quest.description:
You know, stranger, there comes a time in every man's life when he has to admit that he's lost the fight.
Well, I've fought and I've lost. Who did I lose to? Who is my great enemy? Well, don't laugh... it's a bunch of damn fish.
I'm a fisherman. Or at least, I was. Until one of those slaughterfish damn near took my leg off. I was collecting their scales, see. I had a contract with this young alchemist. You wouldn't believe what he was paying for those scales! Then last month, one of the bastards got ahold of my leg. Took me right out of the business. But this alchemist, he needs the scales right away. The alchemist was paying so much for the scales that I'm close to having enough saved so that I can retire. But now, I can't get out there to Lake Rumare -- not with this leg. I only needed twelve more scales! Can you believe it? I was so close!
I've picked up a few things in my travels. If you head out there and bring me back the twelve scales that I need, I can make it worth your time. Help an old fisherman out, won't you?

TESS179: the noblewoman who rules over Riften

plots: the player raided Sarthis' warehouse and killed him for Laila Law-Giver: the player knows where the source of the Skooma is

quest.title: Supply and Demand
quest.objective: destroy the source of Skooma and report back to Laila Law-Giver
tasks: go to the source of Skooma
destroy the source of Skooma and report back to Laila Law-Giver
quest.description:
It's nice to receive good news for a change. Did you recover anything else from the warehouse worth mentioning?
If you have discovered the source of Skooma, then there's no time to lose. It won't take long for Sarthis's associates to learn of his death. The source of the poison must be destroyed once and for all, otherwise another dealer will simply take his place.
Do this task for me and you'll be well on your way to a title in Riften. Report back to me when your task is complete.

TESS156: the player's superior in the Thieves Guild

plots: most businesses in Skyrim keep their transactions recorded within business ledgers

quest.title: The Numbers Job

change the numbers in the business ledger
make the shortfalls from Thieves Guild's other jobs look legit
quest.description:
Most of the establishments in Skyrim keep their transactions recorded within business ledgers.
Your job would be to change the numbers in those books so the shortfalls from our other jobs look legit. In this case, we want to waylay a shipment on the way from this business without them even noticin' anything went missin'.
Feel like doing a bit of writin' in Bits and Pieces in Solitude?

TESS627: a fellow mage student who is working hard on new spells

plots: J'zargo gives the player plenty of flame cloak scrolls

quest.title: J'zargo's Experiment
quest.objective: help J'zargo test his new spells
